amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to to insert the text of the Senate-passed version of the bill (S. 1156).
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute to delete all the provisions of the bill except the provisions granting a five percent pay raise to police officers and firefighters and to insert the text of the Senate-passed version of the bill (S. 1156). Most of the legislative provisions of the House bill would be eliminated. The amendment would not provide funds for school vouchers, and appropriates $35 million less than the House bill, including $10 million more as the federal contribution to the D.C. operations.

action.text: Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Moran (VA).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Moran (VA) amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 197 - 212, 1 Present (Roll no. 512).
